name: Allvar Gullstrand's 60th Birthday
obverse: Bust of Allvar Gullstrand facing right
reverse: Inscription in 9 lines with date at bottom. A Rod of Asclepius and branch of laurel are above the date.
reverse_inscriptions: ARTIBVS MEDICORVM PHYSICORVM MATHEMATICORVM·VSVS OBSCVRA·OCVLI ILLVSTRAVIT * * * SOCIO·HON·EGREGIE·MERITO SEXAGENARIO SOCIETAS·MEDICORVM·SVEC·
references: Ophthalmologia Optica & Visio in Nummis I.85
description: This medal was created to commemorate Gullstrand's 60th birthday.
It was commissioned by the Swedish Medical Society and created by Erik Lindberg.
